title: Or arivu mudal
sahitya:
Or arivu mudal Ararivu varaiyum uyirkk-uyir Anavan oruvan arivAi manamE


anupallavi

  pAra pakSamillAp-parama karuNAkaran pariti pOl aruLinbam pAlikkum paraman avan


caraNam    muttuk-kuLippavar pOl cittat-tirai vilakki mUzhgi mUzhgi uLLE AzhattilE tEDu
bhakti jnAna karma siddhiyai nADu pArvaiyuLLAkki angE pArppAnaik-kUDu nenjE
